properties.script:
out0 = spark.sql(f"""
    select SRC_SYS_CD,MATL_NUM,PLNT_CD,VAR_CNTL_CD,AUTO_PO_IND,PRCTR_CD,SRC_LIST_IND,LD_GRP_CD,QUAL_MGMT_CNTL_CD,REORDR_QTY,COST_LOT_SIZE_VAL,SERIZATION_PRFL_CD,SPEC_MATL_PLNT_STS_CD,SPEC_MATL_PLNT_STS_DTTM,DEL_IND,LOT_SIZE_VAL,MATL_PLNR_NUM,PRDTN_SUPR_CD,PRDTN_UOM_CD,MATL_ABC_CLSN_CD,AVLBLTY_CHK_IND,SFTY_TIME_IND,SPL_PRCMT_TYPE_CD,PRCMT_TYPE_CD,MRP_TYPE_CD,ORIG_CTRY_CD,PLNG_STRTGY_GRP_CD,RD_VAL_QTY,LOT_SIZE_FX_QTY,GOOD_RCPT_LEAD_DAYS_QTY,LOT_SIZE_MAX_QTY,LOT_SIZE_MIN_QTY,SFTY_STK_QTY,PLNG_TIME_FENCE_DAYS_CNT,MAX_STK_LVL_QTY,SFTY_TIME_DAYS_CNT,PLAN_DELV_DAYS_CNT,SCRAP_PCT,INHS_PRDTN_DAYS_CNT,MIN_SFTY_STK_QTY,BKWRD_CNSMPTN_DAYS_CNT,FRWD_CNSMPTN_DAYS_CNT,CNSMPTN_MODE_CD,PRCHSNG_GRP_CD,MMS_FIN_CLSN_CD,VMI_IND,MSTR_PLNG_FMLY_CD,ENTR_SPEC_MATL_PLNT_STS_CD,ENTR_PRCMT_TYPE_CD,MATL_HAZ_CD,VALUT_CAT,BTCH_MGMT_IN_INTRNL,MRP_PRFL,PER_IN,DEPN_REQ_IN,STRG_COST_PCT_CD,DSCNT_IN,EFF_OUT_DTTM,FLLP_MATL,RQR_GRP_IN,MIX_MRP_IN,BASE_QTY,MAX_STRG_PER,UNIT_FOR_MAX_STRG,OVR_DELV_TLRNC,UNLTD_OVER_DELV_IN,UND_DELV_TLRNC,TOT_REPLN_LT,INSP_STK,BTCH_MGMT_PLNT_IN,FISC_YR_VRNT,CMMDTY_CD,RGN_OF_ORIG_OF_MATL,CMMDTY_CD_UOM,REP_MFG_IN,VERS_IN,ALT_BOM,BOM_USG,KEY_TASK_LIST,GRP_CNTR,ISS_STRG_LOC,MRP_GRP,CMPNT_SCRAP_PCT,CERT_TYPE,INSP_SETUP_FOR_MATL,PHY_INV_CC,CONFIG_MATL,REP_MFG_PRFL,NEG_STK_PLNT,PLNG_CYC,RD_PRFL,CO_PROD_IN,BULK_MATL_IN,FIX_CC_IN,PROD_SCHDLNG_PRFL,CUR_PER,INSP_INTV,DOC_REQ_IN,MATL_FRGHT_GRP,MATL_AUTH_QM,CNTL_CODE,UNIT_OF_ISS,ALT_BOM_METH,SCHDLNG_MRGN_KEY,EXPT_IMPT_GRP,BACKFLUSH_IN,MM_DFLT_SUPP_AREA,BTCH_ENT_PO,ORIG_BATCH_MGMT,MATL_CFOP_CAT,STRG_LOC_EXTRNL_PRCMT,STK_DTRMN_GRP,DO_NOT_COST_IN,SPL_PRCMT_TYPE_COST,CVGE_PRFL_RNG,EXPT_CERT_NUM,EXPT_CERT_DTTM,ORIG_BATCH_REF_MATL,RESET_FCST_MDL,SRVC_LVL,ACT_PUSH,MTS_MTO_FL,CNSMPTN_MODE,DUAL_SRCNG_WIP,MATL_STS_DESC,MATL_PLNR_NM,PRDTN_SUPR_NM,PRCHSNG_GRP_DESC,EXCSE_TAX_RLVNCE,SEQ_NUM,MAINT_STS from
(select *, ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by SRC_SYS_CD,MATL_NUM,PLNT_CD order by MATL_NUM) as RNK FROM
(SELECT
    '{Config.sourceSystem}'   AS SRC_SYS_CD,
    f4102.iblitm AS MATL_NUM,
    f4102.ibmcu AS PLNT_CD,
    NULL AS VAR_CNTL_CD,
    NULL AS AUTO_PO_IND,
    NULL AS PRCTR_CD,
    NULL AS SRC_LIST_IND,
    NULL AS LD_GRP_CD,
    NULL AS QUAL_MGMT_CNTL_CD,
    NULL AS REORDR_QTY,
    NULL AS COST_LOT_SIZE_VAL,
    NULL AS SERIZATION_PRFL_CD,
    TRIM(f4102.ibstkt) AS SPEC_MATL_PLNT_STS_CD,
    NULL AS SPEC_MATL_PLNT_STS_DTTM,
    NULL AS DEL_IND,
    TRIM(f4102.ibopc) AS LOT_SIZE_VAL,
    TRIM(f4102.ibanpl) AS MATL_PLNR_NUM,
    NULL AS PRDTN_SUPR_CD,
    NULL AS PRDTN_UOM_CD,
    TRIM(f4102.ibabcs)  AS MATL_ABC_CLSN_CD,
    TRIM(f4102.ibckav) AS AVLBLTY_CHK_IND,
    NULL AS SFTY_TIME_IND,
    NULL AS SPL_PRCMT_TYPE_CD,
    TRIM(f4102.ibstkt) AS PRCMT_TYPE_CD,
    TRIM(f4102.ibsrp6) AS MRP_TYPE_CD,
    TRIM(f4102.iborig) AS ORIG_CTRY_CD,
    NULL AS PLNG_STRTGY_GRP_CD,
    CAST(TRIM(f4102.ibmult) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS RD_VAL_QTY,
    CAST(TRIM(f4102.ibopv) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS LOT_SIZE_FX_QTY,
    NULL AS GOOD_RCPT_LEAD_DAYS_QTY,
    CAST(TRIM(f4102.ibrqmx) AS DECIMAL(22, 4)) AS LOT_SIZE_MAX_QTY,
    CAST(TRIM(f4102.ibrqmn) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS LOT_SIZE_MIN_QTY,
    CAST(TRIM(f4102.ibsafe) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS SFTY_STK_QTY,
    TRIM(f4102.ibltlv) AS PLNG_TIME_FENCE_DAYS_CNT,
    NULL AS MAX_STK_LVL_QTY,
    NULL AS SFTY_TIME_DAYS_CNT,
    CAST(TRIM(f4102.ibltlv) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS PLAN_DELV_DAYS_CNT,
    NULL AS SCRAP_PCT,
    CAST(TRIM(f4102.ibltlv) AS DECIMAL(18, 4)) AS INHS_PRDTN_DAYS_CNT,
    NULL AS MIN_SFTY_STK_QTY,
    NULL AS BKWRD_CNSMPTN_DAYS_CNT,
    NULL AS FRWD_CNSMPTN_DAYS_CNT,
    NULL AS CNSMPTN_MODE_CD,
    NULL AS PRCHSNG_GRP_CD,
    NULL AS MMS_FIN_CLSN_CD,
    NULL AS VMI_IND,
    NULL AS MSTR_PLNG_FMLY_CD,
    NULL AS ENTR_SPEC_MATL_PLNT_STS_CD,
    NULL AS ENTR_PRCMT_TYPE_CD,
    NULL AS MATL_HAZ_CD,
    NULL AS VALUT_CAT,
    NULL AS BTCH_MGMT_IN_INTRNL,
    NULL AS MRP_PRFL,
    NULL AS PER_IN,
    NULL AS DEPN_REQ_IN,
    NULL AS STRG_COST_PCT_CD,
    NULL AS DSCNT_IN,
    NULL AS EFF_OUT_DTTM,
    NULL AS FLLP_MATL,
    NULL AS RQR_GRP_IN,
    NULL AS MIX_MRP_IN,
    NULL AS BASE_QTY,
    NULL AS MAX_STRG_PER,
    NULL AS UNIT_FOR_MAX_STRG,
    NULL AS OVR_DELV_TLRNC,
    NULL AS UNLTD_OVER_DELV_IN,
    NULL AS UND_DELV_TLRNC,
    NULL AS TOT_REPLN_LT,
    NULL AS INSP_STK,
    NULL AS BTCH_MGMT_PLNT_IN,
    NULL AS FISC_YR_VRNT,
    NULL AS CMMDTY_CD,
    NULL AS RGN_OF_ORIG_OF_MATL,
    NULL AS CMMDTY_CD_UOM,
    NULL AS REP_MFG_IN,
    NULL AS VERS_IN,
    NULL AS ALT_BOM,
    NULL AS BOM_USG,
    NULL AS KEY_TASK_LIST,
    NULL AS GRP_CNTR,
    NULL AS ISS_STRG_LOC,
    NULL AS MRP_GRP,
    NULL AS CMPNT_SCRAP_PCT,
    NULL AS CERT_TYPE,
    NULL AS INSP_SETUP_FOR_MATL,
    NULL AS PHY_INV_CC,
    NULL AS CONFIG_MATL,
    NULL AS REP_MFG_PRFL,
    NULL AS NEG_STK_PLNT,
    NULL AS PLNG_CYC,
    NULL AS RD_PRFL,
    NULL AS CO_PROD_IN,
    NULL AS BULK_MATL_IN,
    NULL AS FIX_CC_IN,
    NULL AS PROD_SCHDLNG_PRFL,
    NULL AS CUR_PER,
    NULL AS INSP_INTV,
    NULL AS DOC_REQ_IN,
    NULL AS MATL_FRGHT_GRP,
    NULL AS MATL_AUTH_QM,
    NULL AS CNTL_CODE,
    NULL AS UNIT_OF_ISS,
    NULL AS ALT_BOM_METH,
    NULL AS SCHDLNG_MRGN_KEY,
    NULL AS EXPT_IMPT_GRP,
    NULL AS BACKFLUSH_IN,
    NULL AS MM_DFLT_SUPP_AREA,
    NULL AS BTCH_ENT_PO,
    NULL AS ORIG_BATCH_MGMT,
    NULL AS MATL_CFOP_CAT,
    NULL AS STRG_LOC_EXTRNL_PRCMT,
    NULL AS STK_DTRMN_GRP,
    NULL AS DO_NOT_COST_IN,
    NULL AS SPL_PRCMT_TYPE_COST,
    NULL AS CVGE_PRFL_RNG,
    NULL AS EXPT_CERT_NUM,
    NULL AS EXPT_CERT_DTTM,
    NULL AS ORIG_BATCH_REF_MATL,
    NULL AS RESET_FCST_MDL,
    NULL AS SRVC_LVL,
    NULL AS ACT_PUSH,
    NULL AS MTS_MTO_FL,
    NULL AS CNSMPTN_MODE,
    NULL AS DUAL_SRCNG_WIP,
    NULL AS MATL_STS_DESC,
    NULL AS MATL_PLNR_NM,
    NULL AS PRDTN_SUPR_NM,
    NULL AS PRCHSNG_GRP_DESC,
 NULL AS EXCSE_TAX_RLVNCE,
    NULL AS SEQ_NUM,
    NULL AS MAINT_STS
FROM {Config.sourceDatabase}.f4102 f4102
INNER JOIN {Config.sourceDatabase}.f4101 f4101 ON f4102.ibitm=f4101.imitm
AND f4101._deleted_ = 'F'
WHERE f4102._deleted_ = 'F'))
where RNK = 1  
 
""")
